title: Online Crafts Marketplace Etsy Prepares For Public Offering
teaser: Etsy — the company best known for selling handmade goods — is going public. The financial media is having a lot of fun with this IPO, even mocking it as "artisanal." But it's actually serious business. The company has grown steadily and is considered one of the more promising recent IPOs.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
